wikipedia_page.main: Sir Harry Langhorne Thompson  (6 February 1857 – 28 April 1902) was a British colonial administrator in Cyprus and the West Indies.

*Harry Langhorne Thompson, Administrator of the Island of St; Vincent.
Thompson married Agatha Vaughan Cornish, daughter of Rev. George Cornish, in 1856. The colonial administrator Sir Harry Langhorne Thompson was his son.
